Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to extending the authorization of the city of Oswego to impose an additional rate of sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Extends authorization for an additional one percent sales and compensating use tax in the city of Oswego until November 30, 2023.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending authorization for an additional one percent sales and compensating use tax in the city of Oswego
